casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

September 30, 2008

[Cite as 09/30/2008 Case Announcements #2, 2008-0hio-5039.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-1731. Grundstein v. Spanagel.

In Prohibition. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of prohibition. Upon consideration of relator’s exigent motion for stay and to immediately issue an alternative writ,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
